title: Gironde
extract:
Gironde is a department of the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region of southwest France.


Towns

1 Bordeaux is the attractive capital, a  UNESCO World Heritage Site for its fine architecture.
2 Soulac-sur-Mer is a beach resort.
3 Arcachon is another beach resort.
4 Saint Emilion is the main town of a wine-producing area.


Other destinations
1 Euronat village is a nudist / naturist resort.


Understand


Get in
Bordeaux-Mérignac Airport (BOD IATA)


Get around


See
 Château de Roquetaillade. This natural defensive site has always been inhabited by humans since the stone age. Today you will find two castles inside a protective wall. The first castle dating from the XIth century has lots many of its original fortifications. The second castle was built in 1306 with the permission of JKing Edward the 1st, and is still lived in by the same family since. 
 Château de Curton. A castle and Bordeaux winery. 
Château de Langoiran is a castle founded in the 13th century.


Do
For vineyard tours and wine tasting, see Bordeaux#Taste wine.


Eat
-Noisettines du Medoc: A confectionery made in Medoc since 1981 in the north of Aquitaine.
It is based on high quality hazelnuts, gauged and unshelled. http://www.noisettines.fr


Drink
See also: Bordeaux#Taste wine, Nouvelle-Aquitaine#Drink


Stay safe


Go next
